Package org.forgerock.openidm.security.impl

Class SecurityResourceProvider

java.lang.Object
org.forgerock.openidm.security.impl.SecurityResourceProvider
Direct Known Subclasses:
EntryResourceProvider, KeystoreResourceProvider
public class SecurityResourceProvider extends Object
A class containing common members and methods of a Security ResourceProvider implementation.
